name: Shi Yang teaches you to learn disaster prevention
name_original: Shi Yang teaches you to learn disaster prevention
description:
Game introduction: Shi Yang teach you to prevent disaster prevention" is a popular science simulation game, the player through the operation of the game characters to learn meteorological disaster prevention knowledge, such as snowstorms, dust storms, floods and other common sense. The game is full of interesting settings, the actor's fancy for death so that players can understand the precious life.

Operation instructions: the arrow keys to controls the movement, Enter key controls determination, ESC key to controls the exit / cancel.
